channel.title: IPhone 4
channel.description:
Who's getting theirs today?
I'm in Canada so they just arrived, and they are all unlocked
[img]http://www-bgr-com.vimg.net/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/iphone-4-facetime.jpg[/img]
Don't post if you aren't going to post anything relevant to topic, and don't post "IPhone's suck"

item.title: IPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

I’m left handed and 90% of my phone use is voice calling, so the antenna problem would get on my nerves. I’ve almost decided on the 3GS, but hopefully Apple will get their act together soon enough.

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @mandood77 mandood77
item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:26, topic:351964”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=448318.msg3293622#msg3293622 date=1280790998]

if your going to say the iphone 4 sucks (which i kind of do) atleast give a reason, thats like saying rs is better than rsps’s (ik, bad example).

It’s flawless, and whoever says it isn’t is a faggot. The Canadian IPhone 4’s are perfect.

how can you say its flawless if apple admitted to having poor antenna design?

You have to deliberately try to squeeze it to put the signal down.
[/quote]To be honest, I have seen the effects of the antenna flaw. It’s not very noticeable though. You can still almost always send texts with little to no signal. It’s only rare that I can’t send an MMS while I have low signal. Even so, it’s pretty rare that I have low signal to begin with, so I don’t see the problem.[/quote]you just wait, it’ll happen at some point, dont worry =P

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:25, topic:351964"][quote author=la­wl link=topic=448318.msg3293607#msg3293607 date=1280790439]

if your going to say the iphone 4 sucks (which i kind of do) atleast give a reason, thats like saying rs is better than rsps’s (ik, bad example).

It’s flawless, and whoever says it isn’t is a faggot. The Canadian IPhone 4’s are perfect.

how can you say its flawless if apple admitted to having poor antenna design?
[/quote]

You have to deliberately try to squeeze it to put the signal down.[/quote]To be honest, I have seen the effects of the antenna flaw. It’s not very noticeable though. You can still almost always send texts with little to no signal. It’s only rare that I can’t send an MMS while I have low signal. Even so, it’s pretty rare that I have low signal to begin with, so I don’t see the problem.

Read full topic
